snippet: “I want to have this chance,” the British teenager told the judge after her parents disagreed about the cryogenic preservation procedure....
lead_paragraph: “I want to have this chance,” the British teenager told the judge after her parents disagreed about the cryogenic preservation procedure.

headline.main: Last Wish of Dying Girl, 14, to Be Frozen, Is Granted by Judge
headline.print_headline: Wish of Girl, 14, to Be Frozen Is Granted by British Judge
